segments.text: I keep looking at the woman and her unconcerned demeanor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her expression is utterly neutral, without a hint of worry.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's standing right in a pool of water, yet doesn't flinch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is steadily gushing over the sink's edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's making quite a mess on the cabinet doors below.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thought of cleaning all that up is frankly disgusting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water damage can be so hard to repair.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost hear the steady drip and splash.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those poor cabinets are getting soaked.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What an absolute waste of water too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It feels so frustrating to watch her not react.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to tell her to turn off that faucet!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is just an avoidable disaster unfolding in slow motion.
segments.speaker: PAR
